title: Solar Orbiter Radio and Plasma Wave (RPW), Level 2 Low Frequency Receiver (LFR) Basic Parameter Set 1 (BP1) Data in Survey Mode - M.Maksimovic (LESIA, Observatoire de Paris-CNRS)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch_N_F1' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/rpw/science/l2/lfr-surv-bp1/2020/solo_l2_rpw-lfr-surv-bp1_20200615_v07.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 37.5162% of the 8090 timesteps. Cadence = 3999961000 [ns] = PT3.999961S.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Time for F1 frequencies in normal mode

parameters.name: PE_N_F1
parameters.description: Spectral power of E field in normal mode at F1
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Spectral power of E field (N, F1)

parameters.name: PB_N_F1
parameters.description: Spectral power of B field in normal mode at F1
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Spectral power of B field (N, F1)

parameters.name: NVEC_N_F1
parameters.description: Wave normal vector from magnetic field in normal mode at F1 in the SCM B1-B2-B3 axis system frame.

parameters.name: NVEC_N_F1_SRF
parameters.description: Wave normal vector from magnetic field in normal mode at F1 in spacecraft reference frame (SRF).

parameters.name: ELLIP_N_F1
parameters.description: Wave ellipticity from magnetic field in normal mode at F1
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Wave ellipticity from magnetic field (N, F1)

parameters.name: DOP_N_F1
parameters.description: degree of polarization from magnetic field in normal mode at F1
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: degree of polarization from magnetic field (N, F1)

parameters.name: SX_REA_N_F1
parameters.description: Real part of the X component of the Poynting vector in normal mode at F1
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Real part of X Poynting flux (N, F1)

parameters.name: SX_ARG_N_F1
parameters.description: Argument bit = 0 if |ARG(SX)| < pi/4 or 3pi/4 < |ARG(SX)| < pi, bit arg = 1 elsewhere in normal mode at F1
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Arg bit of X Poynting flux (N, F1)

parameters.name: VPHI_REA_N_F1
parameters.description: Phase speed from the EM data stream in normal mode at F1
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Phase speed from the EM data stream (N, F1)

parameters.name: VPHI_ARG_N_F1
parameters.description: Argument of VPHI in normal mode at F1
